author: Pmeiring
body:
This PR introduces the new CALO-L2 Tau isolation LUT for 2025 post-TS1 pp data-taking.

The LUT is the "baseline" version from this JIRA ticket, which also contains all validation studies:
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-1395
title: Update CALO-L2 Tau Isolation LUT for 2025 post-TS1
